title: New: Katy Perry – Wide Awake (Groundislava Cool Mix)
content:
Fresh from playing an official SXSW show alongside the likes of Ryan Hemsworth, Daedelus and Shlohmo, LA producer Groundislava has dropped his newest remix, a re-working of Katy Perry’s Wide Awake.

As with his previous remixes and original tracks, it’s a headfuck of chopped vocal samples and heart racing percussion. Maintaining the key ‘pop’ backbone of the song, Groundislava turns a chart topping tune into one far more likely to be heard at the slickest SXSW parties. Tell all your friends.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
